Unicron/Vehement/Sun Crusher/Reflector/Teufel:




Unicron's massive form turned to face the near equal form of Vehement 
and the smaller forms of Sun Crusher and Reflector, all three of them 
bowing.

"I failed in my mission, mighty Chaos-Bringer.  I am ready to face 
punishment." the Archbishop of the Brotherhood Vehement said with a 
bow.

/IT DOES NOT MATTER/ Unicron's god-like voice boomed through the room 
as if a strong wind was inside the volcano.  /THE IGL IS OF NO 
CONSEQUENCE/

Teufel disguised as Zardus thanks to highly advanced holographic 
technology approached Unicron, getting on one knee and raising the 
charred, black head of what may have once resembled some kind of 
feline.  "I have found it Great One, and I give it to you."

Unicron took the head with no recognition of Teufel's kneeling, 
placing the charred head on a rounded platform.  In a bright flash 
the head was gone and Unicron turned to a large stasis tube where the 
head was now seemingly hovering inside.  But it was floating in a 
kind of liquid as cables seemed to come out of nowhere from inside 
the tube and attach themselves to the decapitated head.

/THIS WILL DO QUITE NICELY.  YOU ALL WILL NOT BE NEEDED FOR A LITTLE 
WHILE SO I GIVE YOU LEAVE TO DO WHATEVER YOU WISH/ Unicron said, all 
of the Brotherhood turning and leaving the command center of the Rana 
Kao volcano that was the Brotherhood base.
